DOC.brief_summary: The purpose FiSK Junior investigate whether intake oily fish compare poultry affect cardiovascular risk marker , cognitive function , behaviour healthy child .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Oily Fish Poultry Children 's Cardiometabolic Health Cognitive Function
DOC.detailed_description: The FiSK Junior study compare effect consume oily fish versus poultry ( control ) healthy 8-9 year-old Danish child . The child randomize consume approximately 300 g/week either oily fish poultry 12 week . Measurements biological sampling perform baseline end intervention . The main objective study investigate effect cardiovascular risk marker , primarily blood pressure plasma triacylglycerol . Moreover , effect cognitive function , behaviour , emotion physiological stress response assess . In addition , change n-3 long chain polyunsaturated fatty acid status ( compliance ) , anthropometry , body composition , vitamin D status , inflammatory marker , growth marker , physical activity diet measure . Outcomes analyse focus potential gender- genotype-specific effect .
DOC.criteria: Children must : Be 8 9 year age start intervention Be healthy Like oily fish chicken Be willing randomize eat fish chicken Not consume oily fish per week 3 month prior intervention start Not consume fish oil 3 month prior intervention start Speak Danish order understand study procedures Moreover : Parents must read speak Danish , order properly inform study procedures The child must live household â‰¤5 person Serious chronic illness disease may interfere study outcome Diagnosed ADHD psychiatric illness Intake medication may affect study outcome Concomitant participation study involve dietary supplement blood sample Living household another participate child
